item.description: The SleepyTown Collection is a Brand New multi-media, multi-cultural children project about a bully-free magical world that's accessible by using a very special key, and animals pretty much run the enchanted, fun filled world. Â The main library chooses the reader and keeping the magical balance are the three powerful, shape-shifting, time bending Wyrdd Sisters. Â
